alert.note: Alert for Yavapai (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 01 at 5:07AM MST until September 01 at 7:30AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 AM MST THIS MORNING FOR YAVAPAI COUNTY... At 505 AM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated thunderstorms produced heavy rain across the warned area. Flash flooding is ongoing or already occurred. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Prescott, Hillside, Hawkins, Yava, Piedmont, Yarnell, Congress, Skull Valley, Escapees North Ranch, McLendon Peak, Wilhoit, Tres Alamos Wilderness, Bagdad, Bagdad Airport and Wickenburg Ranch. This includes the following swimming holes... Wolf Creek Falls. This includes the following highways... Highway 93 between mile markers 149 and 196. State Route 89 between mile markers 258 and 309. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Normally dry washes, slot canyons and creeks can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
